title: Something’s Burning - Steve-O & Annie Lederman Hate My Mediterranean Seafood Stew
itunes:title: Something’s Burning - Steve-O & Annie Lederman Hate My Mediterranean Seafood Stew
description:
Comedian/Jackass star Steve-O and comedian Annie Lederman come over to watch me make a Mediterranean Seafood Stew. 

 

Follow Annie

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/annielederman 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/annielederman 

 

Follow Steve-O

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/steveo 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/steveo 

 

Get Season 1 of Something’s Burning AND brand new merch at https://bertyboyproductions.com/somethings-burning  

 

 

JOE ROGAN HULK CUM DRINK

 

INGREDIENTS

Kale 

Cucumber 

Green Apple

Spinach

Ginger

 

 

Steps

1) chop up ingredients

2) throw in a juicer until blended

 

 

MEDITERRANEAN SEAFOOD STEW

 

INGREDIENTS

 

  • Garlic
  • Onion
  • Bell pepper 
  • Can of diced tomatoes
  • Squid
  • Hake / Halibut / Seabass
  • Jumbo Shrimp
  • Mussels
  • Dried Thyme
  • Paprika
  • Saffron
  • Sugar
  • Broth
  • Water
  • Olive Oil

 

Steps

  1. Mince garlic, dice onion, dice bell pepper, cut squid, and chop the fish
  2. Heat olive oil on medium heat and sauté squid
  3. Remove and set aside
  4. Cook onions, garlic, and peppers together
  5. Add thyme, paprika, salt; stir together
  6. Add diced tomatoes, sugar, and salt; stir together
  7. Add broth, water, saffron; gently mix.
  8. Turn the heat up; once it boils, turn back to low
  9. Add chopped fish, cooked squid, shrimp, and mussels; cover.
  10. After about 5 min, remove the lid to check if the mussels are open and fish is cooked.  Once done, remove from heat and serve.

 

This episode is brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BURNING” at http://www.betterhelp.com/burning
